subtitle: A delicious filling for baked potatoes.

method.text: Preheat a low or medium grill.
Holding the potatoes in an oven glove, carefully scoop out the potato flesh from each, leaving the skins as shells.
In a bowl, mash the potato with the butter, seasoning and pesto until smooth and well mixed.
Divide the filling back between each shell.
Top each filled potato shell with a few tomato wedges, pieces of salami, olives and a sprinkling of shredded basil.
Scatter over a few Parmesan shavings. Grill to heat through for about 2 min until piping hot, making sure the topping doesn't burn. Garnish with the basil sprigs and serve immediately.

title: Italian pesto filler
